summary: The "Loans In Our Neighborhoods Act of 2025" (LIONs Act of 2025) aims to amend the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958. It primarily focuses on increasing the maximum loan amounts for certain small business loans. Specifically, it raises the maximum loan amount for 7(a) loans and for development company loans, effectively making more capital available to small businesses. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 5, 2025.
